actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A concurrent resolution to congratulate the people of East Germany on their free and democratic elections.

summary.text: Congratulates: (1) the people of East Germany and all the participating candidates on the conduct of free legislative elections on March 18, 1990; and (2) the representatives elected. Expresses the desire of the Congress to work with such representatives for a free and peaceful Europe.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to congratulate the people of East Germany on their free and democratic elections.
